item.title: Softshoeballet
item.description: After much hemming and hawing, I’ve decided to throw an old recording I did 20+ years ago on Bandcamp. The link should be on the front page of this site. The name of the recording is Softshoeballet. I’ll probably link to it on Facebook, Instagram, etc. If you find your way to this page and want a free promo code to download it for free, shoot me an email. A little about the piece:
